title: Mundo Bug
body: Just had a game where our whole team could not see the mundo cleavers at all, just the damage and slow being dealt. while their team could see them? Anybody else have this issue, It was so frustating!

replies.body:
I've had similar problems with Karma abilites and other skill shots. Even when jungling sometimes my Smite animation doesnt show but the damage is applied to the monster.

I just assumed its my shtty computer and the new rift clashing heads
